name: Minecraft Server Checker Extension
tagline: A scratch extension thats lets you check minecraft server status
body:
#MCAPI.US IS NOT ONLINE FOR SOME REASON! <http://events.mcapi.us>

# Welcome to Minecraft Server Checker Extension

[Use the extension](http://scratchx.org/?url=http://mrcomputer1.github.io/MinecraftServerCheckerExtension/MinecraftExtension.js#scratch) - Loads the extension on <http://scratchx.org>

[Comment](Comment.html)

[Source Code](http://github.com/mrcomputer1/MinecraftServerCheckerExtension/blob/gh-pages/MinecraftExtension.js) - Shows the source code!

[Report an issue with this website's content or the extension](http://github.com/Mrcomputer1/MinecraftServerCheckerExtension/issues)

[Change Logs](http://github.com/Mrcomputer1/MinecraftSerevrCheckerExtension/wiki/ChangeLogs) - Views the change logs

This extensions uses <http://MCApi.us> API to check the server status

For Mojang Status block it uses <http://status.mojang.com/check>

#Example Project (Server Checker)

[Download](examples/ServerChecker.sbx)

[Use](http://scratchx.org/?url=http://Mrcomputer1.github.io/MinecraftServerCheckerExtension/examples/ServerChecker.sbx#scratch)

#Example Project (Mojang Status)

[Download](examples/MojangStatus.sbx)

[Use](http://scratchx.org/?url=http://Mrcomputer1.github.io/MinecraftServerCheckerExtension/examples/MojangStatus.sbx#scratch)

# How To Use

## Is \[\] \(\) Online?

![Is [] (25565) Online?](http://i58.tinypic.com/154hgt4.png)

Is \[SERVER IP\] \(SERVER PORT\) Online?

If it returns 1 it is online if it returns 0 it is offline

## Motd of \[\] \(\)

![Motd of [] (25565)](http://i58.tinypic.com/2lnu3bq.png)

Motd of \[SERVER IP\] \(SERVER PORT\)

It should return the message or it will return 0

## Online players of \[\] \(\)

![Online players of [] (25565)](http://i60.tinypic.com/2072jps.png)

Online players of \[SERVER IP\] \(SERVER PORT\)

It should return the online player count of 0

## Max players of \[\] \(\)

![Max players of [] (25565)](http://i61.tinypic.com/35cr66f.png)

Max players of \[SERVER IP\] \(SERVER PORT\)

Returns max players or 0

## Server Software of \[\] \(\)

![Server Software of [] (25565)](http://i60.tinypic.com/20pvarr.png)

Server Software of \[SERVER IP\] \(SERVER PORT\)

Returns server software or 0

## Is \[\] \(\) \[ v\]

![Is [] (25565) [1.8.3-1.8 v]](http://i62.tinypic.com/20p8ni9.png)

Is \[SERVER IP\] \(SERVER PORT\) \[VERSION v\]

Returns 1 if it is that version or 0 if it is not that version it will return -1 if it is offline

## Get Version \[\] \(\)

![Get Version [] (25565)](http://i60.tinypic.com/2czr8s8.png)

Get Version \[SERVER IP\] \(SERVER PORT\)

Returns 1.8.3, 1.8-pre3, 1.8-pre2, 1.8-pre1, 1.7.10-1.7.6, 1.7.5-1.7.1pre or 0

## Get Mojang Status \[ v\]

![Get Mojang Status [minecraft.net v]](http://i57.tinypic.com/s4tlba.png)

Get Mojang Status \[A Mojang Service\]

Returns 1 means online and 0 if offline or not working that well

## Server IP \[ v\]

![Server IP [ v]](http://i60.tinypic.com/2poa2xk.png)

Server IP \[ v\]

Returns the IP of the server if you pick the --[US]-- or --[EU]-- or --[Unknown]-- or ---- or Suggest a server it will return " "

## Server Port \[ v\]

![Server Port [ v]](http://i58.tinypic.com/2ni7iav.png)

Server Port \[ v\]

Returns the Port of the server if you pick the --[US]-- or --[EU]-- or --[Unknown]-- or ---- or Suggest a server it will return " "

## \< \[\] Turns is blocks into booleans \>

\<\<\<No Image\>\>\>

\< \[\] Turns is blocks into booleans \>

Allows to use the IS blocks as booleans and not reporters
